activities: Dell Cloud Clinical Archive (DCCA) is a Dell managed service that provides a solution for integrating with clinical applications in healthcare in order to enable secure archiving of data and enable secure clinical exchange for the purposes of collaborative care. DCCA collects information under the direction of its clients, and has no direct relationship with the individuals whose personal data it processes. The type of data processed on behalf of DCCA’s clients depends upon those clients’ sole and exclusive decisions.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: This does not include manually processed data. DCCA does not have a direct relationship with the individuals/data subjects. DCCA is a data processor and processes personal data controlled by our clients at their direction and under contract. The type of  'personal data' processed is determined by our clients, the data controllers..
recoursemech: TRUSTe provides third party dispute resolution services to support Dell Cloud Clinical Archive's Safe Harbor enrollment, as required by the Department of Commerce.
